welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Okotoks, where the stunning Rocky Mountains meet small-town charm. Get ready to explore our beautiful parks, unique shops, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our beloved city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calgary International Airport houses all major airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Calgary International Airport serves as a hub for international flights and offers customs and immigration services.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Calgary International Airport serves all domestic flights within Canada and offers a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
